name: Moon Gun | Moonlight Spirits
description:
A game created in 3 hours and 30 minutes. Unfortunately I didn't make the Trijam 16 because of a gameobject orientation issue. That literally took me 30 minutes extra. (mouse position changes in orthographic and perspective camera modes.) You live and you learn. 

Your moon gun only works in moonlight. Use it to destroy as much vampire waves as possible.

Making Off:

https://youtu.be/Eh8J27VuB_Y
